item.description:
Thursday, Dec. 31, 2009
Club Caribe at the Courtyard Marriott
777 Memorial Drive
Cambridge, MA
8pm-2am

This event is 21+

SalsaBoston and Havana Club are pleased to bring you this year's New Year's Salsa Gala, with two floors of entertainment! We will be taking over the Courtyard Marriott Hotel, home of Club Caribe. Featuring two floors of dancing with DJ's D.Martinez, Saoko, and Guy, Lessons, and 400+ fun, cool, classy people to meet, mix and mingle with as we ring in the New Year!

Floor #1: Salsa with DJ D. Martinez and DJ Saoko of Providence
Floor #2: Latin Mix with DJ Guy and DJ Saoko
Passed hors d'oeuvres and food stations
Snacks
Cash Bar
Champagne Toast
Free beginner lesson
Free Coat Check
Free Parking


Schedule:
8pm: Doors open
8-9pm: "Warm Up" with cocktails
9-10pm: Beginner Salsa Lesson (no partner needed)
10pm-2: Dancing!

Tickets:

$25 Advance Purchase (+ .75 cent online ticketing fee)
$35 at the door (if available)

Tickets are available directly through the Boston Salsa Meetup Group!
Last day to register: December 30, 2009!

Hotel Rooms:

We have a special $99 (plus taxes) room rate for this event, based on availability. To qualify, you must be an attendee of the event. Contact the hotel front desk to reserve, at (617) 492-7777. Mention the SalsaBoston New Year's $99 Rate.

Note: If the agent cannot find the rate in the system, ask them to confirm with "Richard".

Directions:

By MBTA: Green Line to "BU West", walk over the BU Bridge, bear left down Memorial Drive, and the Courtyard Marriott is about 500yds up on the right side.

Also by MBTA: Red Line to Central and walk down to the river or a short cab ride. It's a bit further of a walk though.

By Car via I-93: Take I-93 to the Storrow Drive Exit (23). Follow signs to Storrow Drive. Once on Storrow Drive, go about 2-3 miles and take the first _right_ exit, for River St/Cambridge. At the top of the ramp, take a right and go over the Charles River. On the far side, turn right again onto Memorial Drive, and the Courtyard Marriott is 100yds up on the left. (Alternatively, cross over to Memorial Drive sooner and follow Memorial Drive up-river to the hotel which will be on the right.)

By Car via Mass Pike: Take exit 20 for Cambridge/Alston. Stay right after the tolls, and go down the off ramp. Continue straight through a massive intersection and across the Charles River. On the far side, turn right on to Memorial Drive, and the Courtyard Marriott is 100yds up on the left.


Parking:

Free parking is available in the hotel garage, and also in the mall's parking lot adjacent to the hotel until 1:30. Please stay away from the truck loading areas for the businesses.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Eve Salsa Gala @ Club Caribe
